projects.title: Performance Modeling of HPC I/O on NVM
projects.intro: Master research topic about NVM (none-volatilized memory). Mainly responsed for testing the performance of NVM. Also tried to find the optimization potentials. Paper 'Performance Evaluation and Modeling of HPC I/O on Non-Volatile Memory' published in NAS IEEE 2017 conference.

projects.title: Lottery System
projects.intro: A lottery system made for Shanghai Haiyan company. A simple and easy to use lottery system. Used for 15 days in a row and sent out 10,000 prizes in total.

projects.title: PASA Lab Official Site
projects.intro: The official site for my lab in UC Merced. Used to introduce our lab and announce recent news. Powered by WordPress and used MVC framework to danamically present news.

projects.title: Bug Prediction System for Github Reposites
projects.intro: Built a system that collects code features in given GitHub repository by Python and uses machine learning algorithms supported by Windows Azure to predict potential bugs. The results show more than 90% correctness.

projects.title: Collecsion Detect Algorithm for 3D Objects
projects.intro: Used V-COLLIDE Algorithm to detect whether two 3D objects are collected. Course project for computer geometry.

projects.title: Baiyaotong Medicine Consulting System
projects.intro: Led a team into building a Web-App, which uses WordPress as frame and Openfire to realize instant communication. Received a great praise as my graduate project for bachelor degree.
